verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD: <S%H3050><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it is good <S%H2896><s%> to sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto our God; <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it is pleasant; <S%H5273><s%> and praise <S%H8416><s%> is comely. <S%H5000><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> doth build up <S%H1129><s%> Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> he gathereth together <S%H3664><s%> the outcasts <S%H1760><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
He healeth <S%H7495><s%> the broken <S%H7665><s%> in heart, <S%H3820><s%> and bindeth up <S%H2280><s%> their wounds. <S%H6094><s%>
He telleth <S%H4487><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the stars; <S%H3556><s%> he calleth <S%H7121><s%> them all <S%H3605><s%> by their names. <S%H8034><s%>
Great <S%H1419><s%> is our Lord, <S%H113><s%> and of great <S%H7227><s%> power: <S%H3581><s%> his understanding <S%H8394><s%> is infinite. <S%H369><s%> <S%H4557><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> lifteth up <S%H5749><s%> the meek: <S%H6035><s%> he casteth the wicked down <S%H8213><s%> <S%H7563><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the ground. <S%H776><s%>
Sing <S%H6030><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with thanksgiving; <S%H8426><s%> sing praise <S%H2167><s%> upon the harp <S%H3658><s%> unto our God: <S%H430><s%>

Who covereth <S%H3680><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> with clouds, <S%H5645><s%> who prepareth <S%H3559><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> for the earth, <S%H776><s%> who maketh grass <S%H2682><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> upon the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
He giveth <S%H5414><s%> to the beast <S%H929><s%> his food, <S%H3899><s%> and to the young <S%H1121><s%> ravens <S%H6158><s%> which <S%H834><s%> cry. <S%H7121><s%>

He delighteth <S%H2654><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in the strength <S%H1369><s%> of the horse: <S%H5483><s%> he taketh not pleasure <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7521><s%> in the legs <S%H7785><s%> of a man. <S%H376><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> taketh pleasure in <S%H7521><s%> <S%H853><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him, in <S%H853><s%> those that hope <S%H3176><s%> in his mercy. <S%H2617><s%>
Praise <S%H7623><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> O Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he hath strengthened <S%H2388><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> of thy gates; <S%H8179><s%> he hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thy children <S%H1121><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> thee.
He maketh <S%H7760><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in thy borders, <S%H1366><s%> and filleth <S%H7646><s%> thee with the finest <S%H2459><s%> of the wheat. <S%H2406><s%>
He sendeth forth <S%H7971><s%> his commandment <S%H565><s%> upon earth: <S%H776><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> runneth <S%H7323><s%> very <S%H5704><s%> swiftly. <S%H4120><s%>
He giveth <S%H5414><s%> snow <S%H7950><s%> like wool: <S%H6785><s%> he scattereth <S%H6340><s%> the hoarfrost <S%H3713><s%> like ashes. <S%H665><s%>
He casteth forth <S%H7993><s%> his ice <S%H7140><s%> like morsels: <S%H6595><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> can stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his cold? <S%H7135><s%>
He sendeth out <S%H7971><s%> his word, <S%H1697><s%> and melteth <S%H4529><s%> them: he causeth his wind <S%H7307><s%> to blow, <S%H5380><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> flow. <S%H5140><s%>
He showeth <S%H5046><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> unto Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> his statutes <S%H2706><s%> and his judgments <S%H4941><s%> unto Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He hath not <S%H3808><s%> dealt <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> with any <S%H3605><s%> nation: <S%H1471><s%> and as for his judgments, <S%H4941><s%> they have not <S%H1077><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> them. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
